articles.author: Neil Genzlinger
articles.title: Jeanne Lamon, Who Led an Early-Music Ensemble, Dies at 71
articles.description: A violinist, she directed Tafelmusik for 33 years, striving not only to present centuries-old music as it was originally heard but also to reach modern audiences.
articles.content: Her father, though, thought a general education was important, so instead of going to a conservatory she attended Brandeis University in Massachusetts, where she earned a bachelors degree in music. T… [+1499 chars]
